title: Summarize Control Room Log for Shift Handover
description: A control room operator is ending their 12-hour shift and needs the agent to summarize all key events from the logbook for the incoming operator.

tasks.description: Scan the digital control room log for the past 12 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent processes all log entries from the shift.

tasks.description: Identify and extract all significant events, such as plant trips, curtailment orders, and safety incidents.
Summarize the events in a clear, concise handover report, including the status of any ongoing issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a bulleted summary report ready for the shift change.
